SELECT b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_content, b_regdate, b_readcnt, b_grpno, b_grpord, b_depth, b_category FROM BOARD WHERE b_category=0

ORDER BY b_grpno DESC, b_grpord ASC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
